page.title: 06INTERVIEW-MANOR FARM RUNCORN
page.content: How old is the farm?{400 yrs.}How big is it?{140 acres.}What is grown?{ {Potatoes,barley for cattle feed and {beer production, oats for horses, {grass for hay and silage.}How much is harvested?{10-12 tons per acre {potatoes.2 tons per acre barley and {oats.}What animals are kept?{14 {Friesan cross Hereford,calves kept {from 6 weeks until 2 yrs. and then {transferred to dairy herd on another {farm.Only 8 hens,others killed by a {fox.}What are the cows called?{ {Ivy,Blossom,Patsy and other ladies' {names.Identified by numbered metal tag {in ear.}What machinery is there?{ {Tractors,balers,ploughs,harvsters.}Who is employed?{2 sons and 2 casual {workers.}
